core.name: Mental Sync
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Mental Sync: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 30, team gains 26% Crit Rate. PSY-type characters gain 29% Crit DMG.

subskills.name: Mental Sync
subskills.description: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 30, team gains 26% Crit Rate. PSY-type characters gain 29% Crit DMG.

core.name: Switch: Shield Charge
core.description:
Switch skill immediately unleashes a Shield Charge.
Shield Charge: 150% ATK of Physical DMG and knocks enemy into the air.

subskills.name: Power Charge
subskills.description: Additionally deals 1,125 Physical DMG against enemies hit by Shield Charge.

subskills.name: QTE: Honkai Barrier
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when an enemy is Time-Slowed, ram with Super Shield Charge. dealing 600% of Physical DMG, stunning enemies for 5s, and inflicting 6 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Mecha Barrier
subskills.description: All team members have a mech shield that absorbs Physical DMG. This shield has 558 HP which is fully restored if not attacked for 6.0s.

subskills.name: Reactive Shield
subskills.description: Mecha shield deals 1,620 Lightning DMG to surrounding enemies and knocks them airborne when breached.

subskills.name: Reinforced Barrier
subskills.description: Mecha shield receives DEF equal to 100% of Yamabuki's DEF.

core.name: Overdrive Mode
core.description:
Unlocks the Mecha's energy restrictions to enter Burst mode: Overdrive.
Overdrive Cost: At over 40 SP, consumes 10 SP to enter Burst mode and 10 SP/s afterwards until SP is depleted during which the Valkyrie gains Iron Body.
Overdrive Switch: Tap [Ultimate] to switch off Overdrive.
Heat Reset: Heat meters of laser-type weapons will be reset upon Burst activation.

subskills.name: Terror Drain
subskills.description: When Overdrive Mode is triggered, heal the whole team by 108 HP for every impaired enemy hit by fist attacks.

subskills.name: Terror Freeze
subskills.description: Upon triggering Overdrive Mode, apply Time Lock to impaired enemies for 10.0s. Affected enemies remain impaired during Time Lock.

subskills.name: Mending Link
subskills.description: When Overdrive Mode is triggered, heal the whole team by 299 HP for each enemy kill.

core.name: Dimension Field
core.description:
Raises the shield to defend against frontal attacks.
Counterstrike: Release the [Defense] button at the moment of the attack to unleash a counterstrike, dealing 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
Perfect Defense: Counterstrike triggers a 5s Time Fracture, during which the Valkyrie gains 50% Move Speed and 30% ATK Speed for 3s.Base CD of Perfect Defense: 15s.

subskills.name: Reflective Shield
subskills.description: Defense against ranged attacks can also trigger Counterstrike to unleash Shield Charge and ignite enemies dealing 30% ATK of Fire DMG every 0.5s for 10s and inflicting 5 Ignite Trauma.

subskills.name: Reverse Trajectory
subskills.description: Reflects the thrown objects back to the ranged attacker upon starting defense, dealing 350% of the original damage.

subskills.name: Field Propulsion
subskills.description: Recovers 4 SP for the whole team after Counterstrike.

core.name: Charge: Particle Cannon
core.description:
Charged cannon fire that deals greater DMG with higher charge sequence.
Arm Switch: Charging mode changes with type of weapon equipped.

subskills.name: Mech Phobia
subskills.description: Uncharged attacks impairs the target and other enemies nearby, decreasing their DEF by 30.0% for 10.0s.

subskills.name: Energy Overload
subskills.description: Increases charging speed by 50.0% but decreases Crit Rate by 50%.
